title: Positive attitude reward?
body:
Just wondering do they give special icon for good attitude at the end of the season? I had Baron Nashor icon at 2012 but... that was so long time ago. My ego wasnt so big and I never trashtalked to other people.
Currently chat restricted/14 days bans are pretty average stage for me (every 2 months for sure) so I don't even know if there any reward for better attitude.

replies.body: only in league community can people think they deserve an award for acting the way they were supposed to act from the start...

> [{quoted}](name=RÃ²ssy,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yfRPs1QJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-21T13:03:06.921+0000)
>
> only in league community can people think they deserve an award for acting the way they were supposed to act from the start...

And this what makes League better game.
Only in League do people not realize toxicity is generated from trolls.

> [{quoted}](name=Sharkbait Ohaha,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yfRPs1QJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-21T13:12:54.495+0000)
>
> Only in League do people not realize toxicity is generated from trolls.

Who cares. Smash mute button and he wont bother you at all. But hey. Babycrying about toxicity is way better.
